name: Mountain Taxi Service 3D
description:
Mountain Taxi Service 3D is packed with thrilling and exciting pick and drop missions. Pick up passengers from distant locations and take them to their destination on time. The sights of snowy rocky hills will add enjoyment to your journey.
FEATURES:

-Adventurous taxi drive on mountain.
-Thrill giving ride.
-Beautiful GUI.
-Sound effect applied very nicely.
-Highly tuned taxi cabs in hardcore mode.
